price: „Да“, одговори он, „и бићете тада, сигурно, од оних мени блиских.“
arabic: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla naʿam wa-innakum idhan lamina al-muqarabīna
translations: the ones who are brought near
